Return a modifiable Collection containing the interfaces that send and received Service Discovery Packets.
getPort() - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service
Return the port for the service
getServiceNames() - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Zeroconf
Return the list of fully-qualified service names that have been heard by this object The returned Collection is read-only, thread-safe without synchronization and live - it will be updated by this object.
getServices() - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Zeroconf
Return the list of all Services that have been heard by this object.
getServiceTypes() - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Zeroconf
Return the list of type names that have been heard by this object, eg "_http.

getTTL_SRV() - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
Get the time-to-live in seconds for any "srv" records announced for this service.
getTTL_TXT() - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder

S

Service - Class in com.bfo.zeroconf
Service represents a new Service to be announced by the Zeroconf class, or an existing service which has been announced on the network.
Service.Builder - Class in com.bfo.zeroconf
A Builder class to create a new Service for announcement
serviceAnnounced(Service) - Method in interface com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener
Called when the Zeroconf class is notified of a new service
serviceExpired(Service) - Method in interface com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener
Called when the Zeroconf class exoires a service name that was previously announced.
serviceModified(Service) - Method in interface com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener
Called when the Zeroconf class modifies a service that has previously been announced, perhaps to change a network address
serviceNamed(String, String) - Method in interface com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener
Called when the Zeroconf class is notified of a new service name
serviceNameExpired(String, String) - Method in interface com.bfo.zeroconf.ZeroconfListener
Called when the Zeroconf class expires a service name it was previously notified about

Set the fully qualifier host name - it should contain a domain.

Set whether announcements should be made on IPv4 addresses (default=true)
setIPv6(boolean) - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Zeroconf

(Required) Set the instance name

(Required) Set the port to announce.
setTTL_A(int) - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
Set the time-to-live in seconds for any "a" or "aaaa" records announced for this service.
setTTL_PTR(int) - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
Set the time-to-live in seconds for any "ptr" records announced for this service.
setTTL_SRV(int) - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
Set the time-to-live in seconds for any "srv" records announced for this service.
setTTL_TXT(int) - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
Set the time-to-live in seconds for any "txt" records announced for this service.
setType(String) - Method in class com.bfo.zeroconf.Service.Builder
(Required) Set the service type - a combination of the service name and protocol, eg "_http.

Z

Zeroconf - Class in com.bfo.zeroconf
This is the root class for the Service Discovery object, which can be used to announce a Service, listen for announcements or both.
Zeroconf() - Constructor for class com.bfo.zeroconf.Zeroconf
Create a new Zeroconf object
ZeroconfListener - Interface in com.bfo.zeroconf
An interface that can be added to the Zeroconf class to be notified about events.
